name: Azure Liberation
description:
1927DT, the continent of Athenia still rages with conflict after almost 4 years since the start of The Iron War, with The Freedom Alliance and The Rosikov Empire still in a stalemate. Caught between the two giants is an island just off the coast of the mainland, once its own nation called “Azeria”, before the Rosikov occupation became official in 1924. Since then, the island has been used as nothing more than a factory. It’s inhabitants; enslaved for the Rosikov regime's war effort. But now a revolution is coming, and it’s your job to lead a small militia to victory, take back your country and liberate its people.

  • Tactical turnbased combat
  • Set in a world of political tension and depth
  • Sketch-book art style

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Left click - Attack / Skip turn
